analyzed: lha dang de'i bdag po la sbyin sreg dbul bar bya @237b ste;/

analyzed: ldang ba'i tshe na yang rang gi lha la 'thor 'thung lan gsum phul te dri dang me tog la sogs pas mchod par bya'o //

analyzed: d'ur ba'i myu gu mar dang bcas pas kyang rang gi lha dang me lha yongs su tshim zhing mnyes par bsams @238a * //

analyzed: sbyin sreg byed bzhin pa nyid kyi tshe ni tsha ba'i shing med na /

analyzed: rgya skyegs kyi khu bas spyi bo nas brtsams te rkang mthil gyi bar dmar bar bsams na /

analyzed: 'bras bu dang me tog skyur ba rnams kyis sbyin sreg byas na gang yang rung ba dbang du bya ba'i dam pa yin no //

original: 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston te /

analyzed: me'i nang na yod pa'i 'bras bu'am /

analyzed: dgyes pas ni sbyin sreg byed pa'i sngags pa la ci 'dod pa'i gzugs su mdzad par 'gyur te /
